oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pioneer Rhythm Boys - WHFB - 1948-12-04
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pioneer Rhythm Boys radio show for station WHFB, Benton Harbor, MI. Originally broadcast Saturday December 4, 1948 at 11:30 am. Featuring 'Jimmy' (announcer), Eddie Skates (host), and (verbally identified) band members Bud 'The Deacon' Wheeler, Alma Michael, Butch, and Tiny. Sponsored by Ray's Auto Service and Al's Grocery.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pioneer Rhythm Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Jimmy) -- Opening statement (Eddie Skates) -- Let's Say Goodbye Like We Said Hello -- Ray's Auto Service commercial (Jimmy) -- Eddie Skates introduces Alma Michael -- Red Roses Tied In Blue -- Eddie Skates introduces Tiny -- Flop-Eared Mule -- Al's Grocery Store commercial (Jimmy) -- Eddie Skates introduces Butch and Alma -- My Happiness -- Eddie Skates introduces Deacon -- I Can't Hide The Tears In My Eyes -- Eddie Skates introduces Butch -- When The Snowflakes Fall Again -- Closing statement (Eddie Skates) -- Theme -- Closing statement (Jimmy)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WHFB (Radio station : Benton Harbor, Mich.); Pioneer Rhythm Boys
